Type.Name: IconSelectedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void IconSelectedHandler(object o, IconSelectedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed IconSelectedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the IconSelectedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the IconSelectedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the IconSelectedHandler is removed from the event.
